title: The Fire
description: FROM GOODREADS DEBUT FINALIST AND USA TODAY BESTSELLING AUTHOR OF THE HURRICANE COMES THE FIRE.   Evelyn Danaher lives a quiet, uneventful life. That is until she meets Tommy. The only man who makes her lose control of her temper and her knickers at the same time.   Tattooed, Irish firefighter Tommy Riordon found the woman of his dreams, then crashed and burned when a misunderstanding left him on his knees, clutching his balls.   They are wrong for each other in every way. But the very best love stores are the ones that shouldn’t work. After all, the fire that doesn’t kill you, makes you stronger.   Contemporary Romance. Contains sexual situations, violence, offensive language and mature topics. Recommended for age 18 years and up.  Books in The Hurricane Series:  1. The Hurricane 2. The Aftermath 3. The Storm 4. The Fire
author: R.J. Prescott
